actions.description:
shortcut for creating a new wireframe. Available options:

name:		project name, such as 'Wireframe New Homepage'
		(be sure to wrap in quotes)

actions.name: ready
actions.description: generates a gitlab pipeline yaml file

actions.name: publish
actions.description:
Replaces the gitlab-ci file with one that includes the incorporation of 
				the github publishing repo; also, asks if you would like to 
				add a link to that repo's README
